rows.label: qev090901_MSG0001
rows.name: Hello, H.B.! Is your suspension over?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh, that was just Vandham talking.
You know how he gets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0003
rows.name:
I didn't receive a formal censure,
so I'm not sparing it a second thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0004
rows.name: You do remember he's our commander, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0005
rows.name: ...Would you PLEASE try to talk some sense into H.B.?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0006
rows.name:
If he and the commander don't lay this
feud to rest, it's liable to explode![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask H.B. what is going on with him and Vandham.

rows.label: qev090901_JNK0020
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev090901_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell H.B. that he has to meet Vandham halfway.

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0007
rows.name:
I wasn't planning on bringing it up.
Didn't want to cause undue worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0008
rows.name:
To compromise on this matter would be
to go against everything I stand for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0009
rows.name:
I didn't even want to talk about it, to be honest.
But since we're here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, I suppose you have a right to know.
And frankly, I'd like to tell you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0011
rows.name:
A while ago, I gathered some Pathfinder
colleagues and took on an assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0012
rows.name:
It was a hunt for indigens so vicious,
no one else was willing to face them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0013_02
rows.name:
And yes, we suffered a few injuries,
but the mission succeeded in the end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0013_03
rows.name:
It's proof that Harriers aren't the only ones
who can handle these indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0014_02
rows.name:
However, Commander Vandham appears
to have reached a different conclusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0015
rows.name: ...In that he punched me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0016
rows.name:
He told me I wasn't to do any BLADE work
until I'd come to my senses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0017
rows.name:
Egregious, I know.
Were this Earth, there'd be a lawsuit for certain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0018_02
rows.name: The commander was entirely right to be upset![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0018_03
rows.name:
You stole another division's job and turned out
five injured BLADEs in the process![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0018_04
rows.name: What possessed you to be so irresponsible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0019
rows.name:
I happen to be the BLADE best acquainted with the area.
I was the logical choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0020
rows.name:
The commander's old-fashioned system
keeps talented people from utilizing those talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0021
rows.name: You can see that, can't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090901_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that H.B. is one hundred percent correct.

rows.label: qev090901_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev090901_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell H.B. that he needs to follow BLADE rules.

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0022
rows.name: I knew you would see reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0023
rows.name: I should have brought this to you much sooner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0024_02
rows.name: These current rules cannot keep New LA safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0024_03
rows.name:
Injuries were sustained, yes,
but I protected the city from those indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0024_04
rows.name:
I would expect praise for my efforts,
not a mouthful of loose teeth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0024_05
rows.name:
Flexible and adaptableâ€”
that's how to get optimal performance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0025
rows.name: Ugh. He STILL doesn't get it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0027_02
rows.name: You are anything but normal, H.B.![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0028
rows.name:
I certainly hope not, Miss Eleonora.
Normal is a slur to one of my singular talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0029_02
rows.name: Now, will you join me at the nest of those indigens?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0029_03
rows.name: They reproduce with alarming alacrity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0029_04
rows.name:
Thinning their numbers does little good
so long as the queen lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0029_05
rows.name: Unlike last time, it'll just be us, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0029_06
rows.name: Well, I think we can agree that should be more than enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0031
rows.name: Wonderful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090901_MSG0031_2
rows.name: Now that that's settled, let's be on our way.[ST:wait ]
